name: Shockwaves (itch)
description:
Made on Clickteam.

Shoutout to Almightzentaco for the shockwave tutorial! ➤ https://www.youtube.com/user/almightyzentaco

===========================================================

Shockwave is a useless game, You press on your keyboard "1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 0" to change the map. And click anywhere to see a shockwave.

But there is a secret!

You go find it yourself =)

===========================================================
